TopicTitle: Could someone add an airlock tag to a model, through unity3d?

Articles.Content:
I made a model Munbase model, but it needs an airlock. Now I tried to add an airlock through Unity, but I can't seem to get it to work.

Probably doesn't work because I'm using Linux/Wine. So I was wondering if someone could add an airlock for me?
Yes I could add an airlock. Send me the file with your try so I can tell you what you did wrong.
